actions.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB; Treasury Department.
Committee on Finance. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Finance. Reported to Senate by Senator Dole under the authority of the order of Jun 25, 81 favorably with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 97-144.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 187.
Subtitle C of Title III of the Committee Amendment (dealing with Employee Stock Ownership Provisions), as amended, agreed to. By Yea-Nay Vote. 93-1. Record Vote No: 220.
Motion to reconsider amendments SU296 and SU297 tabled by Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 94-1. Record Vote No: 227.
The committee amendment, as amended, agreed to. By Yea-Nay Vote. 89-11. Record Vote No: 239.
The joint resolution, as amended, was returned to the Calendar, pursuant to previous order.
Senate incorporated this measure in H.R. 4242 as an amendment.
Previous third reading vitiated, as was the action the Senate took in agreeing to the committee amendment as amended. By Voice Vote.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate) Amends the Second Liberty Bond Act to increase the temporary public debt limit by $599,800,000,000 for the period from May 21, 1981, through September 30, 1981.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for a temporary increase in the public debt limit.
